technical_skills: Cloud-based AI services (Azure AI Foundry, Azure Machine Learning, AWS SageMaker, AWS Bedrock)
GenAI workflows (prompt engineering, embeddings, vector search, chatbots, Agentic AI)
soft_skills: Passion for applying AI to real-world problems
experience_requirements: Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence or related field
Familiarity with cloud AI services (preferably Azure and AWS)
Basic understanding of software system building and API integration
Willingness to learn best practices in gitOps, testing, CI/CD, secure development
key_responsibilities: Deliver impactful AI-powered software solutions and automation
education_requirements: Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, or related field
nice_to_have: Experience with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP)
Experience building data pipelines or working with databases
Familiarity with modern front-end or full-stack development
Interest in large language models (LLMs), vector search, chatbot integrations

location_requirements.work_authorization: Permanent residency, citizenship, or valid work visa with at least 18 months remaining

work_schedule: Full-time, typically 4 days office, 1 flexible day
benefits: 4 weeks annual leave plus purchased leave options
career_growth: Internal gigs and project-based work to expand skills
diversity_inclusion: Committed to building an inclusive culture embedded in daily activities and business practices
special_instructions: Applicants must be based in New Zealand and have appropriate work authorization

skill_details.skill_name: Azure AI Foundry and Machine Learning
Software system building and API integration
GenAI workflows (prompt engineering, embeddings, vector search, chatbots, Agentic AI)

strengths: Relevant degree in computer science or related field
Good familiarity with cloud AI services, especially Azure and AWS
Passion and curiosity for AI and its real-world applications
gaps: Limited cloud platform experience beyond Azure and AWS
Relatively lower experience in CI/CD and secure development best practices
Less exposure to business automation and telecommunications industry specifics

score_explanation: Technical skills scored based on proficiency and years experience in key required technologies with weighted importance favoring critical AI development skills such as Python and cloud AI platforms.
Soft skills rated high due to emphasis on collaboration, communication, and learning mindset which align well with candidate profile.
Experience assessed as solid with relevant degree and programming background, but junior/intermediate level indicated, matching the job requirement level.
Education match is strong, degree requirement fulfilled and relevant to role.
Industry knowledge score slightly lower reflecting limited deep telecommunications experience, but familiarity with digital services sector considered.
Overall match score calculated from weighted average of component scores reflecting good candidate fit with some gaps to develop for seniority.
